alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued May 02 at 5:52AM EDT until May 02 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 30 knots and waves 1 to 2 feet expected. * WHERE...Lake Moultrie. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on Lake Moultrie will create hazardous conditions for small craft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Large wave action along the east side of the lake may result in minor lakeshore erosion.
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Moultrie should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
